verses.verse: וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> ve-Zot likewise הַבְּרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> hab-be-ra-Chah, And this [is] the blessing אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> be-Rach blessed מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh wherewith Moses אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> lif-Nei before מוֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH4194> mo-To. his death

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar, And he said יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִסִּינַ֥י <WH5514> mis-si-Nai from Sinai בָּא֙ <WH935> ba came וְזָרַ֤ח <WH2224> ve-za-Rach and rose up מִשֵּׂעִיר֙ <WH8165> mis-se-'Ir from Seir לָ֔מוֹ la-mo, הוֹפִ֙יעַ֙ <WH3313> ho-Fi-a' unto them he shined forth מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> me-Har from mount פָּארָ֔ן <WH6290> pa-Ran, Paran וְאָתָ֖ה <WH857> ve-'a-Tah and he came מֵרִבְבֹ֣ת <WH7233> me-riv-Vot with ten thousands קֹ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh; of saints מִֽימִינ֕וֹ <WH3225> mi-mi-No from his right hand; אֵשְׁדָּת 'e-she-dat כאֵ֥שׁ 'Esh ק; דָּ֖ת <WH799> Dat fiery law קלָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אַ֚ף <WH637> 'af Yea חֹבֵ֣ב <WH2245> cho-Vev he loved עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim, the people כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All קְדֹשָׁ֖יו <WH6918> ke-do-Shav all his saints בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; [are] in thy hand וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> ve-Hem and they תֻּכּ֣וּ <WH8497> tuk-Ku and they sat down לְרַגְלֶ֔ךָ <WH7272> le-rag-Le-cha, at thy feet יִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> yis-Sa [every one] shall receive מִדַּבְּרֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1703> mid-dab-be-ro-Tei-cha. of thy words

תּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> to-Rah us a law צִוָּה־ <WH6680> tziv-vah- commanded לָ֖נוּ La-nu מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; Moses מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> mo-ra-Shah [even] the inheritance קְהִלַּ֥ת <WH6952> ke-hil-Lat of the congregation יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko. of Jacob

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi become בִישֻׁר֖וּן <WH3484> vi-shu-Run in Jeshurun מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech; And he was king בְּהִתְאַסֵּף֙ <WH622> be-hit-'as-Sef were gathered רָ֣אשֵׁי <WH7218> Ra-shei when the heads עָ֔ם <WH5971> 'Am, of the people יַ֖חַד <WH3162> Ya-chad together שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> shiv-Tei [and] the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

יְחִ֥י <WH2421> ye-Chi live רְאוּבֵ֖ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven Let Reuben וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- Nor יָמֹ֑ת <WH4191> ya-Mot; and not die וִיהִ֥י <WH1961> vi-Hi become מְתָ֖יו <WH4962> me-Tav and let [not] his men מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> mis-Par. be few ס sa-Mek

וְזֹ֣את <WH2063> ve-Zot regarding לִֽיהוּדָה֮ <WH3063> li-hu-Dah And this [is the blessing] of Judah וַיֹּאמַר֒ <WH559> vai-yo-Mar and he said שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> she-Ma' Hear יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh LORD ק֣וֹל <WH6963> Kol the voice יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo him unto his people תְּבִיאֶ֑נּוּ <WH935> te-vi-'En-nu; and bring יָדָיו֙ <WH3027> ya-Dav let his hands רָ֣ב <WH7227> rav be sufficient ל֔וֹ lo, וְעֵ֥זֶר <WH5828> ve-'E-zer for him and be thou an help מִצָּרָ֖יו <WH6862> mitz-tza-Rav [to him] from his enemies תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> tih-Yeh. become ס sa-Mek

וּלְלֵוִ֣י <WH3878> u-le-le-Vi And of Levi אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said תֻּמֶּ֥יךָ <WH8550> tum-Mei-cha [Let] thy Thummim וְאוּרֶ֖יךָ <WH224> ve-'u-Rei-cha and thy Urim לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish one חֲסִידֶ֑ךָ <WH2623> cha-si-De-cha; [be] with thy holy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Whom נִסִּיתוֹ֙ <WH5254> nis-si-To whom thou didst prove בְּמַסָּ֔ה <WH4532> be-mas-Sah, at Massah תְּרִיבֵ֖הוּ <WH7378> te-ri-Ve-hu [and with] whom thou didst strive עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- at מֵ֥י <WH4325> mei at the waters מְרִיבָֽה׃ <WH4809> me-ri-Vah. of Meribah

הָאֹמֵ֞ר <WH559> ha-'o-Mer Who said לְאָבִ֤יו <WH1> le-'a-Viv unto his father וּלְאִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> u-le-'im-Mo and to his mother לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor רְאִיתִ֔יו <WH7200> re-'i-Tiv, I have not seen וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> 'e-Chav his brethren לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor הִכִּ֔יר <WH5234> hik-Kir, him neither did he acknowledge וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et ; בָּנֹו ba-nov כבָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> ba-Nav afflicted קלֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יָדָ֑ע <WH3045> ya-Da'; nor knew כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for שָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> sha-me-Ru for they have observed אִמְרָתֶ֔ךָ <WH565> 'im-ra-Te-cha, thy word וּבְרִֽיתְךָ֖ <WH1285> u-ve-ri-te-Cha thy covenant יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> yin-Tzo-ru. and kept

יוֹר֤וּ <WH3384> yo-Ru They shall teach מִשְׁפָּטֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH4941> mish-pa-Tei-cha thy judgments לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> le-ya-'a-Ko, Jacob וְתוֹרָתְךָ֖ <WH8451> ve-to-ra-te-Cha thy law לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> le-Yis-ra-'El; and Israel יָשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> ya-Si-mu they shall put קְטוֹרָה֙ <WH6988> ke-to-Rah incense בְּאַפֶּ֔ךָ <WH639> be-'ap-Pe-cha, before וְכָלִ֖יל <WH3632> ve-cha-Lil thee and whole burnt sacrifice עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- on מִזְבְּחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4196> miz-be-Che-cha. upon thine altar

בָּרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> ba-Rech Bless יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> chei-Lo, his substance וּפֹ֥עַל <WH6467> u-Fo-'al the work יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> ya-Dav of his hands תִּרְצֶ֑ה <WH7521> tir-Tzeh; and accept מְחַ֨ץ <WH4272> me-Chatz smite מָתְנַ֧יִם <WH4975> ma-te-Na-yim through the loins קָמָ֛יו <WH6965> ka-Mav of them that rise וּמְשַׂנְאָ֖יו <WH8130> u-me-san-'Av against him and of them that hate מִן־ <WH4480> min- not יְקוּמֽוּן׃ <WH6965> ye-ku-Mun. again ס sa-Mek

לְבִנְיָמִ֣ן <WH1144> le-vin-ya-Min [And] of Benjamin אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said יְדִ֣יד <WH3039> ye-Did The beloved יְהֹוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> yish-Kon shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach in safety עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav; and חֹפֵ֤ף <WH2653> cho-Fef by him [and the LORD] shall cover עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lav and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, him all the day וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between כְּתֵיפָ֖יו <WH3802> ke-tei-Fav between his shoulders שָׁכֵֽן׃ <WH7931> sha-Chen. long and he shall dwell ס sa-Mek

וּלְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> u-le-yo-Sef And of Joseph אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said מְבֹרֶ֥כֶת <WH1288> me-vo-Re-chet Blessed יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> ar-Tzo; [be] his land מִמֶּ֤גֶד <WH4022> mi-Me-ged for the precious things שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim of heaven מִטָּ֔ל <WH2919> mit-Tal, for the dew וּמִתְּה֖וֹם <WH8415> u-mit-te-Hom and for the deep רֹבֶ֥צֶת <WH7257> ro-Ve-tzet that coucheth beneath תָּֽחַת׃ <WH8478> Ta-chat. beneath

וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> u-mi-Me-ged And for the precious תְּבוּאֹ֣ת <WH8393> te-vu-'Ot fruits שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> Sha-mesh; [brought forth] by the sun וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> u-mi-Me-ged and for the precious things גֶּ֥רֶשׁ <WH1645> Ge-resh put forth יְרָחִֽים׃ <WH3391> ye-ra-Chim. by the moon

וּמֵרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> u-me-Rosh And for the chief things הַרְרֵי־ <WH2042> har-rei- mountains קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> Ke-dem; of the ancient וּמִמֶּ֖גֶד <WH4022> u-mi-Me-ged and for the precious things גִּבְע֥וֹת <WH1389> giv-'ot hills עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. of the lasting

וּמִמֶּ֗גֶד <WH4022> u-mi-Me-ged, And for the precious things אֶ֚רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz of the earth וּמְלֹאָ֔הּ <WH4393> u-me-lo-'Ah, and fulness וּרְצ֥וֹן <WH7522> u-re-Tzon thereof and [for] the good will שֹׁכְנִ֖י <WH7931> sho-che-Ni of him that dwelt סְנֶ֑ה <WH5572> se-Neh; in the bush תָּב֙וֹאתָה֙ <WH935> ta-Vo-tah let [the blessing] come לְרֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> le-Rosh upon the head יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> yo-Sef, of Joseph וּלְקָדְקֹ֖ד <WH6936> u-le-ka-de-Kod and upon the top of the head נְזִ֥יר <WH5139> ne-Zir of him [that was] separated אֶחָֽיו׃ <WH251> 'e-Chav. from his brethren

בְּכ֨וֹר <WH1060> be-Chor [is like] the firstling שׁוֹר֜וֹ <WH7794> sho-Ro of his bullock הָדָ֣ר <WH1926> ha-Dar His glory ל֗וֹ lo, וְקַרְנֵ֤י <WH7161> ve-kar-Nei and his horns רְאֵם֙ <WH7214> re-'Em of unicorns קַרְנָ֔יו <WH7161> kar-Nav, [are like] the horns בָּהֶ֗ם ba-Hem, עַמִּ֛ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people יְנַגַּ֥ח <WH5055> ye-nag-Gach with them he shall push יַחְדָּ֖ו <WH3162> yach-Dav together אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> 'af-sei- to the ends אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; of the earth וְהֵם֙ <WH1992> ve-Hem and those רִבְב֣וֹת <WH7233> riv-Vot and they [are] the ten thousands אֶפְרַ֔יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> ve-Hem and those אַלְפֵ֥י <WH505> 'al-Fei and they [are] the thousands מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh. of Manasseh ס sa-Mek

וְלִזְבוּלֻ֣ן <WH2074> ve-liz-vu-Lun And of Zebulun אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said שְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> se-Mach Rejoice זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun בְּצֵאתֶ֑ךָ <WH3318> be-tze-Te-cha; in thy going out וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> ve-yis-so-sh-Char and Issachar בְּאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH168> be-'o-ha-Lei-cha. in thy tents

עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people הַר־ <WH2022> har- unto the mountain יִקְרָ֔אוּ <WH7121> yik-Ra-'u, They shall call שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> sham There יִזְבְּח֣וּ <WH2076> yiz-be-Chu there they shall offer זִבְחֵי־ <WH2077> ziv-chei- sacrifices צֶ֑דֶק <WH6664> Tze-dek; of righteousness כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki out שֶׁ֤פַע <WH8228> She-fa' [of] the abundance יַמִּים֙ <WH3220> yam-Mim of the seas יִינָ֔קוּ <WH3243> yi-Na-ku, for they shall suck וּשְׂפוּנֵ֖י <WH8226> u-se-fu-Nei and [of] treasures טְמ֥וּנֵי <WH2934> te-Mu-nei hid חֽוֹל׃ <WH2344> Chol. in the sand ס sa-Mek

וּלְגָ֣ד <WH1410> u-le-Gad And of Gad אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed מַרְחִ֣יב <WH7337> mar-Chiv [be] he that enlargeth גָּ֑ד <WH1410> Gad; Gad כְּלָבִ֣יא <WH3833> ke-la-Vi as a lion שָׁכֵ֔ן <WH7931> sha-Chen, he dwelleth וְטָרַ֥ף <WH2963> ve-ta-Raf and teareth זְר֖וֹעַ <WH2220> ze-Ro-a' the arm אַף־ <WH637> 'af- with קָדְקֹֽד׃ <WH6936> ka-de-Kod. the crown of the head

וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar And he provided רֵאשִׁית֙ <WH7225> re-Shit the first part ל֔וֹ lo, כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- For שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> sham there חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2513> chel-Kat for himself because there [in] a portion מְחֹקֵ֖ק <WH2710> me-cho-Kek of the lawgiver סָפ֑וּן <WH5603> sa-Fun; [was he] seated וַיֵּתֵא֙ <WH857> vai-ye-Te and he came רָ֣אשֵׁי <WH7218> Ra-shei with the heads עָ֔ם <WH5971> 'Am, of the people צִדְקַ֤ת <WH6666> tzid-Kat the justice יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah, he executed וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. with Israel ס sa-Mek

וּלְדָ֣ן <WH1835> u-le-Dan And of Dan אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said דָּ֖ן <WH1835> dan Dan גּ֣וּר <WH1482> gur whelp אַרְיֵ֑ה <WH738> 'ar-Yeh; [is] a lion's יְזַנֵּ֖ק <WH2187> ye-zan-Nek he shall leap מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> hab-ba-Shan. from Bashan

וּלְנַפְתָּלִ֣י <WH5321> u-le-naf-ta-Li And of Naphtali אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said נַפְתָּלִי֙ <WH5321> naf-ta-Li O Naphtali שְׂבַ֣ע <WH7649> se-Va' satisfied רָצ֔וֹן <WH7522> ra-Tzon, with favour וּמָלֵ֖א <WH4392> u-ma-Le and full בִּרְכַּ֣ת <WH1293> bir-Kat with the blessing יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD יָ֥ם <WH3220> yam thou the west וְדָר֖וֹם <WH1864> ve-da-Rom and the south יְרָֽשָׁה׃ <WH3423> ye-Ra-shah. possess ס sa-Mek

וּלְאָשֵׁ֣ר <WH836> u-le-'a-Sher And of Asher אָמַ֔ר <WH559> 'a-Mar, he said בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch [be] blessed מִבָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> mib-ba-Nim with children אָשֵׁ֑ר <WH836> 'a-Sher; [Let] Asher יְהִ֤י <WH1961> ye-Hi become רְצוּי֙ <WH7521> re-Tzui let him be acceptable אֶחָ֔יו <WH251> 'e-Chav, to his brethren וְטֹבֵ֥ל <WH2881> ve-to-Vel and let him dip בַּשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> bash-She-men in oil רַגְלֽוֹ׃ <WH7272> rag-Lo. his foot

בַּרְזֶ֥ל <WH1270> bar-Zel [shall be] iron וּנְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> u-ne-Cho-shet and brass מִנְעָלֶ֑יךָ <WH4515> min-'a-Lei-cha; Thy shoes וּכְיָמֶ֖יךָ <WH3117> u-che-ya-Mei-cha and as thy days דָּבְאֶֽךָ׃ <WH1679> da-ve-'E-cha. [so shall] thy strength

אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein There כָּאֵ֖ל <WH410> ka-'El [There is] none like unto the God יְשֻׁר֑וּן <WH3484> ye-shu-Run; of Jeshurun רֹכֵ֤ב <WH7392> ro-Chev [who] rideth שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim upon the heaven בְעֶזְרֶ֔ךָ <WH5828> ve-'ez-Re-cha, in thy help וּבְגַאֲוָת֖וֹ <WH1346> u-ve-ga-'a-va-To and in his excellency שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> she-cha-Kim. on the sky
